Body: Possible Duplicate:  Does China Mobile Galaxy S3 model GT I-9308 have Google Play Store?  Just want to check Whether Google Play support Samsung S3 (GT-i9300)?I have downloaded the Google Play to S3 but it won't work?Is there any way to use Google Play on a Samsung Galaxy S 3? (I have a Google account and it worked fine on another Smart Phone.)Actually same issue for other Google applications like Google+, Gmail, etc.
Title: Google Play does not work on Samsung S3 (GT-I9300) purchased in China Unicom

history.Text: Just want to check 1) Whether Google Play support Samsung S3 (GT-i9300)?2) I have downloaded the Google Play to S3 by it won't work?Anyway to use Google Play on Samsung S3 (i have the google account and it's work fine on other Smart Phone)Actually same issue for other google applications like google+, GMAIL, ...
